title: Animals Color by Number for Kids: Coloring Activity for Ages 4 – 8
description:
Color by Number Animals that are fun for kids!


   Suitable for ages 4 – 8: easy to medium 
  
   50 cute animal designs for hours of entertainment 
  
   Large 8.5 x 11 pages made simple to color in 
  
   Improves hand-eye coordination 
  
   Develops number and color identification 
  
   Easy to tear out, single sided pages to prevent bleed through 
  
   Includes free dinosaur coloring pages you can download 
  
Click the link below to view the book on Amazon!
author: Zoey Bird
